resources.string: დარწმუნებული ხართ, რომ გსურთ ამ ელემენტის წაშლა?
. I\'m pretty funny, ey? There were some other options, but I think I\'ll stop there.
ინტერნეტ ძიება, ტექქსტური შეტყობინება, ელექქტრონული წერილი
შენ უნდა წაიკითხო რამოდენიმე წინადადება, რათა გადაამზადო აპლიკაცია შენს ხმაზე და შენს სიტყვებზე

Field linguists and open source developers have gotten together to create a speech recognizer for low resource language speakers. You can use this application to prepare your Android to recognize your speech, or the speech of your language consultants. You need to read some suggestions and then contact WiFi in order to prepare your voice model. We expect that after reading some training sentences you will have a better result. Because low resource languages are different from other languages ​​so we do not know how useful this application will be.


By using this app to train your recognizer you agree that we can use the anonymous training recordings to improve the recognizer and provide anonymous data to linguistics researchers at The City University of New York and Batumi Shota Rustaveli State University. For more information about our Georgian project visit our Batumi group: http://batumi.github.io


The application does not collect personal or sensitive user data and we don't use or share your personal data with anyone.


This application requests a few permissions which you can use to collect your training data. 


• Microphone (required, to detect speech, or record training uttterances)
 • Camera (optional, to take photos or video to describe your training utterances)
 • GPS (optional, to improve the recognizer for the same dialect)
 • Telephone (optional, to add an anonymous identifier your data so you can access it again if you uninstall the app)

 • SDCARD (optional, to save your data so you can access it)


Your data is your data. Your data is saved in the /kartuli-speechrecognition directory on your SDCARD. You can also view and share the data you collect using the LingSync.org application, http://lingsync.org. You can find out more in our privacy policy.
